original_title: The Broadway of Lerner and Loewe
overview: A musical special celebrating the fruitful collaboration of Broadway lyricist/librettist Alan Jay Lerner and composer Frederick Loewe. Stars from the current Broadway hit "Camelot" and from past triumphs such as "My Fair Lady," and the film "Gigi" perform the romantic, sophisticated songs of Lerner and Loewe.
tagline: The magic  of Lerner and Loewe... in colour!
title: The Broadway of Lerner and Loewe
